context_bundle.summary: Claude Code session hooks for continuous logging and pre-compaction dumps. Uses SessionStart, PostToolUse, PreCompact, and SessionEnd hooks. PreCompact cannot block - solution is continuous logging so nothing lost when compaction triggers.

onboarding.quick_start: Run: ~/.phishri/scripts/install-session-hooks.sh. Restart Claude Code. Session logs auto-saved to ~/.claude/session-dumps/. PreCompact fires but can't block - continuous logging is the solution.
common_patterns: SessionStart: Initialize log file with timestamp
PreCompact: Emergency dump marker before crunch
known_errors: PreCompact can't block - it's notification only
PostToolUse can be noisy - filter with matcher
Hook scripts must be fast (<5s) or they timeout

hook_reference.key_insight: PreCompact exists but cannot block. Use continuous logging instead.
